item.title: Filtering text streams
item.description: The script awk-apply-to-record awk awk-apply-to-record.awk { # print NR if (r == "" || NR == r) { if (NR == 1) { printf "%s", $0 |& cmd; } else { if (irs == "y") { printf "%s", RS printf "%s", $0 |& cmd; } else { printf "%s%s", RS, $0 |& cmd; } } close(cmd, "to"); # This is needed because getline will not overwrite if nothing is read $0 = ""; cmd |& getline $0; fflush(cmd); close(cmd); } else { if (NR > 1) { print RS } } print; system(""); } awk-apply-to-record #!
